greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Trace sequence of 3 X 3 Krawtchouk matrix.
comment: Let A=[1,1,1;2,0,-2;1,-1,1], the 3 X 3 Krawtchouk matrix. Then a(n)=trace(A^n).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,4)
formula: Recurrence: a(n) = 4a(n-2), a(0)=3, a(1)=2. - _Ralf Stephan_, Jul 17 2013
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Sep 18 2004
